github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Use conventional commit messages following the pattern: <type>(<scope>): <description>
Types include: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, perf
Use the present tense and imperative mood in descriptions
Keep the first line under 72 characters
Use the body to explain what and why vs. how
Include issue references in the footer when applicable
Use a blank line between the subject and body
Use a blank line between the body and footer
